entry.title: Migrating email service from G Suite Legacy to Gmail + MXRoute

link.title: Migrating email service from G Suite Legacy to Gmail + MXRoute

entry.content: This post describes my experiences migrating email service from G Suite Legacy (x@y.com) to a normal Google account (x.y@gmail.com) attached to the MXRoute email service.
entry.summary: This post describes my experiences migrating email service from G Suite Legacy (x@y.com) to a normal Google account (x.y@gmail.com) attached to the MXRoute email service.

entry.title: Setting up your custom domain email address as an alias for your normal Google account

link.title: Setting up your custom domain email address as an alias for your normal Google account

entry.content: This post describes my experiences allowing a user to log in to a normal Google account (x.y@gmail.com) with their custom domain (previously G Suite Legacy) email address (x@y.com)
entry.summary: This post describes my experiences allowing a user to log in to a normal Google account (x.y@gmail.com) with their custom domain (previously G Suite Legacy) email address (x@y.com)
